newsitem.title: GREECE: Greece raises 789 bln drachmas from T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Greece raises 789 bln drachmas from T-bills.

text.p: The Greek treasury raised 789 billion drachmas from the sale of three-, six- and 12-month T-bills on Monday, an official at the finance ministry told Reuters.
Sales of physical T-bills amounted to 238 billion drachmas and book-entry debt paper at 551 billion drachmas, the official said.
All T-bill rates featured a 10 basis point cut. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
